desc: Welcome to Modern Onion! Where we offer high quality mid century replica furniture at prices that won't make your eyes water! Iconic designs like Aarnio Ball & Bubble chairs, Jacobsen Eggs & Swans, Saarinen Tulips, kids size Eames chairs, Artichoke lamps and more! We do custom ordered items & commercial projects too!

layout.text: Get loved up and comfortable with some of the best lounge seating there is!
LOOK, FIND AND BUY LOUNGE CHAIRS
